channel.title: Quote on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Quote on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Quote of the Week: Safe Stats
item.description: "We need to stop teaching abstinence-only statistics, telling students they can only do it if they are in a committed relationship with a statistician. But all their friends are out there doing statistics and having a great time. We need to teach safe stats." ― Hadley Wickham Source: https://nhorton.people.amherst.edu/mererenovation/17_Wickham.PDF

item.title: Quote of the Week: Sherlock
item.description: “It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data. Insensibly one begins to twist facts to suit theories, instead of theories to suit facts.” ― Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, Sherlock Holmes
